resources.string: VoxBox Radio. Parsing channels, please wait..! Visit voxpopworldwide.com for info..

To start playback, long touch the station name. Touch star to add station to favorites.\nBe careful, playing radio in mobile networks with high bitrates (>32kb) can be expensive if you don\'t have a flat rate.
VoxBox Radio from VoxPop Worldwide www.voxpopworldwide.com
Record all radio sessions to sd card.

If the checkbox above is checked, radio sessions are recorded to your SD card. The state of this checkbox is stored on the SD card and loaded when the app starts. If the player needs to rebuffer, a new file is created.
Do you really want to delete this file:
Select the star of a station and it will show up as a favorite in this list\nClick this text to add a custom stream URL.
Enter deep linking URL of stream"
Sorry, memory low, please free some space on your SD Card!
Your SD Card is low on memory or not mounted, please remove USB cable if present. VirtualRadio needs memory to cache data. You will need about 30 Megabytes for listening to 1 hour of a 64kb stream..
No connection to server, please check settings..
Start File Server to access the content of your SD card from a remote browser via WLAN. Be aware that everybody in the local network can access your content
Welcome to VoxBox Radio.\n\nUse long click to select.
